name: pm2.75
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: com12(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wo(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(w0, w2)))

comment: Theorem *2.75 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 108. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Jan-2013.)
